title: [K-12] STEM-based Science Education Design Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and educational principles, LMS (Learning Management System) experience
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to cultivate science education design and implementation competencies through STEM activities, with digital device integration and resource-sharing via LMS

learning_goals: Participants can design and implement five STEM activity modules applying the DIY, Tinker, Maker framework

Participants enhance lesson design capabilities reflecting all six HIPs domains (structured teaching, project-based learning, reflection, learning progression frameworks, student-centered approaches, TPACK)
Participants can apply Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge (TPACK) required for science education design to actual classroom instruction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
